abstract: The corporations that are quitting the Climate Action Partnership cited concerns over the direction that climate change legislation has taken.
snippet: The corporations that are quitting the Climate Action Partnership cited concerns over the direction that climate change legislation has taken.
lead_paragraph: Three large corporations are quitting the Climate Action Partnership, a group in Washington that has sought to find common ground among corporations and environmental groups in battling global warming.

headline.main: 3 Companies Quit Group Over Moves on Climate
headline.print_headline: 3 Companies Quit Group Over Moves On Climate
